Row.Text: Re-sharpen your weapons, saddle your horses, and make your peace with the divine. Today, we conquer.
I am Amina, Sarauniya and taker of whatever — and whomever — pleases me.
I am Amina, Sarauniya and taker of whatever — and whomever — pleases me.
I am Amina, Sarauniya and taker of whatever — and whomever — pleases me.
As we devour your cities with war, we will open the gates, and let the hyenas break your bones.
Our blades are sharp. Your necks are soft.
From obscurity I rose, and to it I must return. From the desert I will watch you.
